pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'grid' Pattern Grobs // Provides 'grid' grobs that fill in a user-defined area with various patterns. Includes enhanced versions of the geometric and image-based patterns originally contained in the 'ggpattern' package as well as original 'pch', 'polygon_tiling', 'regular_polygon', 'rose', 'text', 'wave', and 'weave' patterns plus support for custom user-defined patterns.
